message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $10,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,500. Can you consider that?
